name: Maya Beach
description:
This is my in progress submission for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again).

Maya Beach is the name of the beach where the movie The Beach was made. It was crowded with tourists taking selfies until 2018 when it was closed to give a change to the nature to recover. This game is a satirical ecological statement. Be the bad guy, ruin the beach.

Start with a blank empty beach, build docks and bring tourists, cut tree, make money.

I cannot test OSX version but I hope it works well.
